author: asmuts
msg: Committing a patch by Chris Fairbanks.  It allows clients to retrieve multple items from the cache with a single call.

author: minfrin
msg: Move the KeptBodySize directive, kept_body filters and the
ap_parse_request_body function out of the http module and into a
new module called mod_request, reducing the size of the core.

author: vitek
msg: * tests/localization/22.locale.num.get.cpp: Add new macro T_MAX to
eliminate potential for accessing local variable via pointer after
it has gone out of scope. Remove global pointer pmax.

author: mcombellack
msg: Added validation check of the threadPoolSize parameter and if it is less than 1 throw an IllegalArgumentException. Updated the JavaDoc to reflect this change
